config.section.performance.desc: Uncheck a tab if it causes issues.
config.lazy_skills.name: Lazy Load Skills (Tab 1)
config.lazy_skills.desc: Delay loading the Skills page until you click on it.
config.lazy_social.name: Lazy Load Social (Tab 2)
config.lazy_social.desc: Delay loading the Social page until you click on it.
config.lazy_crafting.name: Lazy Load Crafting/Cooking (Tab 4)
config.lazy_crafting.desc: Delay loading the Crafting/Cooking page until you click on it.
config.lazy_animals.name: Lazy Load Animals (Tab 5)
config.lazy_animals.desc: Delay loading the Animals page until you click on it.
config.lazy_powers.name: Lazy Load Powers (Tab 6)
config.lazy_powers.desc: Delay loading the Powers page until you click on it.
config.lazy_collections.name: Lazy Load Collections (Tab 7)
config.lazy_collections.desc: Delay loading the Collections page until you click on it.
config.debug_logging.name: Enable Debug Logging
config.debug_logging.desc: Show detailed log messages when tabs are replaced and loaded. Turn off to reduce log spam.
